name: Celltzer
body:
# Celltzer A Sass Grid System based on Bootstrap but... + clean and understandable + easy to customize + not bloated ## 1. Use box/box-flow > line > cells + box is static + box-flow is fluid Example 1: ```html
``` ## 2. Responsive design: + xs for smartphone and above + sm for ipad and above + md for medium desktop + sm for large desktop and above Example 2: ```html
